Package Controller

package Controller
  • Class
    Description
    AdminMovieController
    This class extends the MovieController class and implements additional functionalities for admin staff only
    BookingController
    BookingController is a controller class that holds the logic to view bookings and make new booking.
    BookingsDatabaseController
    BookingsDatabaseController is a controller that is used to write and read from the booking text file.
    CineplexController
    Controller for cineplexes
    CineplexDatabaseController
    Database Controller for cineplexes
    DatabaseController
    Interface for all other database controllers
    LoginController
    This is a controller class that handles the Login UI
    MovieController
    This is a controller class that is deisgn to interact with Movie Database Controller, Movie Object Entity and System Setting Controller
    MovieDatabaseController
    MovieDatabaseController is a controller that is used to write and read from the movie text file.
    MovieGoerController
    MovieGoerController class handles the choice of the movie goer
    MovieGoerMovieController
    MovieGoerMovieController is a controller class that handles the movie goer
    ShowingController
    ShowingController is a controller class that handles showings
    ShowingsDatabaseController
    ShowingsDatabaseController is a controller class that is used to write and read from the showing text file.
    StaffController
    This class is a controller class that is designed to handle the different options of a cinema staff.
    StaffDatabaseController
    This is an controller class that handles the reading and writing of database for Staff
    SystemSettingController
    This is a controller class that is designed to manage SystemSettings entity class
    SystemSettingsDatabaseController
    This is an controller class that handles the reading and writing of database for SystemSetings
